footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Skill Talents: Yelan

fields.name: > Stealthy Bowshot
fields.value:
**Normal Attack:** Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow
**Charged Attack:** Aimed Shot with increased damage: deals Hydro damage when fully charged
**Plunging Attack:** A 'shower of arrows' dealing AoE damage
**Breakthrough:** After spending 5s out of combat, Yelan enters 'Breakthrough' state in which her next Charged Aimed Shot cooldown is reduced by 80%, and it fires a 'Breakthrough Barb' dealing AoE Hydro damage based on her Max HP
*Normal Attack*

fields.name: > Lingering Lifeline
fields.value:
Fires a 'Lifeline' that marks opponents in its path. Yelan can move rapidly forward, after which the Lifeline explodes and deals Hydro damage to marked opponents based on her Max HP.
*Elemental Skill*

fields.name: > Depth-Clarion Dice
fields.value:
Yelan's Elemental Burst deals AoE Hydro damage and creates an 'Exquisite Throw' which deals Hydro damage based on Yelan's Max HP:

> Once every second when the active character uses a Normal Attack
> When Yelan's Lifeline explodes and hits opponents
*Elemental Burst*
